seo.title: FAQ | SustainSage
seo.description: Honest answers about coaching with SustainSage: how to start, ethics, practicalities and whether our support fits your situation.

hero.title: Frequently asked questions
hero.subtitle: Clear, no-pressure answers. If something isn’t covered here, reach out—we’ll respond or signpost someone who can.

items.question: How do we start?
items.answer: Book the 20-minute intro call. We explore what’s happening, name boundaries and decide together if coaching is the right next step. There is no obligation to commit on the call.

items.question: How often will we meet?
items.answer: Most packages meet every two to three weeks so you have time to experiment between sessions. We agree cadence, language and support preferences in writing before we begin.

items.question: How do we know the fit is right?
items.answer: You can read the package pages and our guide to how coaching works. If anything still feels uncertain, bring it to the intro call—we welcome direct questions about style, scope or identity fit.

items.question: What codes do you follow?
items.answer: We align with International Coaching Federation (ICF) ethics: confidentiality, informed consent, cultural humility and staying within coaching scope.

items.question: When will you signpost other professionals?
items.answer: We pause coaching and refer on when trauma, acute mental health, legal, immigration or financial advice is needed. Your wellbeing matters more than keeping a client.

items.question: Will you share my story?
items.answer: Only with your written consent. We use composite examples on our site so no single client is identifiable.

items.question: What languages do you coach in?
items.answer: English (UK) and Mandarin. We can switch mid-session if that helps you express nuance.

items.question: Where and when do sessions happen?
items.answer: Sessions are online via Zoom. We are based in the UK (GMT/BST) and offer a mix of daytime and early-evening slots.

items.question: What about fees?
items.answer: Packages are priced according to length and support level. We share the current fee range during the intro call and offer transparent invoices—no surprise add-ons.

items.question: Do you share session recordings?
items.answer: Only if you request it and it supports your learning. Otherwise we keep notes private and lightweight.

items.question: I’m mid-career and returning after a break—can you help?
items.answer: Yes. Transition or Reset often fits. Read the pages for mid-career returners or book the intro call to confirm.

items.question: I’m new to the UK and figuring out work and life here.
items.answer: We understand relocation. The Transition package is designed for exactly this. Start with our newcomers page to see if the examples resonate.

items.question: I’m a parent balancing care and leadership.
items.answer: Reset offers a short recalibration; Deepening supports longer arcs. Visit the parents page for more context or message us about a custom cadence.

items.question: I’m a recent graduate—am I in the right place?
items.answer: Possibly. We focus on people with some professional experience or community leadership. If you’re just starting out, we may signpost mentoring or peer programmes.

cta.body: Still wondering about something specific? Send us a note or schedule the intro call—we’ll be transparent about whether coaching is the right fit.
